sentences.sContent: THE idea of the universal middle class is a pervasive expression of American egalitarianism — and perhaps the only one left.
sentences.sContent_eng: THE idea of the universal middle class is a pervasive expression of American egalitarianism — and perhaps the only one left.
sentences.sCn: 世界中产阶级是美国平均主义的一种无处不在的表现形式——也许是唯一遗留下来的。

trans.tranCn: 平等主义，[经] 平均主义
trans.tranOther: Egalitarianism is used to refer to the belief that all people are equal and should have the same rights and opportunities, and to actions that are based on this belief
